question: Consider the following statements regarding 'Sambhavâ€™. 1.It is a two-day travelling film festival. 2.The festival tries to cover the lives and issues of all genders. 3.It is an effort of MAVA. Which of the above statements is correct ?
explanation: Men Against Violence and Abuse which works to prevent gender-based violence. The festival tries to cover the lives and issues of all genders.
